name: Eclipse Kernel
body:
ECLIPSE KERNEL for PICO
=======================

BASED ON sakindia123's Linux Kernel 3.0.16 for Htc Explorer (Pico)

FEATURES
========

Will be updated soon

WORKING
=======

- Touchscreen
- Sound
- Hardware Acceleration
- Brightness / Screen controls
- Accelerometer
- Vibrator
- Ambient light sensor
- RIL
- Camera
- Hardware Buttons
- Clock
- Battery
- Phone (Both incoming and outgoing)
- Message service
- Data service
- Capacitive buttons
- GPS
- Storage (Both sdcard and sd-ext works)
- Deep Sleep
- USB 
- WiFi
- Bluetooth
- FM Radio

NOT WORKING
===========

- Nothing really
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
